Traits.Name: Lifelike Appearance
Traits.Content: The Mannequin Drone has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to avoid detection.

Traits.Name: Adaptive Camouflage
Traits.Content: The Mannequin Drone can blend into its surroundings, granting it a +2 bonus to AC against attacks made from creatures that cannot see it.

Actions.Name: Razor Sharp Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, dealing 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage. If the target is hit, they must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become Bleeding, taking 5 (1d10) damage at the start of their next turn. If the target is affected by this condition, the Mannequin Drone can use Follow-Up Strike as a bonus action.

Actions.Name: Follow-Up Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, dealing 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage. This action can only be used against a creature affected by the Bleeding condition.

Actions.Name: Illusory Assault
Actions.Content: The Mannequin Drone merges with its surroundings and creates illusory duplicates of itself. It makes three melee attacks against a single target: +8 to hit, each dealing 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or become Confused until the end of their next turn. This ability recharges on a roll of 5 or 6 on a d6.

Actions.Name: Silent Watcher
Actions.Content: The Mannequin Drone charges up its sensors for a moment, gaining advantage on its next attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional 15 (3d8) force damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away. This ability can be used once per short rest.
